title: Got flagged in BD assignment
content:
i fr dint copy shit
now what

comments.body: Reach out to the TAs. If they are still using the same backend I had worked on, they can see the other team which got flagged with you.
is the college management strict if u r caught in plagiarism for some project?
Prafullata ma'am said there could be a viva held where if you satisfactorily explain your code and approach you can get partial marks. Good luck.
Depends on the course. For some courses in which a good chunk of your grade comes from assignments, they do check pretty strictly.
It depends on if you can prove you did not copy.
Almost all courses are pretty chill with plagiarism, the only exception being Big data and DSA.
Plagiarism checker as well? Which service did y'all use
This bd assignment has been hands down one of the most abysmal educational experiences I've had in ages.
That was the same but they were looking into changing it this year
